text:
Came to this bar to drink and sing, absolutely loved the vibe! The waitress Angel was very friendly and accommodating, she even taught us some drinking card and dice games.
Unfortunately I didn't manage to order any food because I was too caught up with the drinks and the games, I literally forgot that I was hungry. 😂😂

100% will return here for the vibe and the friendly people!

Good and affordable bar near the city area.
The karaoke system is accessible within each table, very traditional songs are available too.
Generally the place is clean.
Can order food from them directly.
Quite a lot of entertainment available as darts machine.

Was brought to this location by a client and found the deco pretty interesting with the sausage shop, but i guess its theme can be extended further as we don't know if it wanted to say its a horror theme aka 人肉叉烧包， sausage party full of guys or། – _ – །
Cosy ambience. There is darts to play. Ambient lighting and  Sound system is good. Price for drinks is decent and place is not rowdy.
Food is great, perhaps the portion too little yet price higher.
